name: Fear of the Dark (ouragan84)
description:
Game made for weekly game jam #144            Theme : In the Dark

Collect the three keys scattered across the dark maze, avoid enemies and go slain the boss by finding the hidden trapdoor.

CONTROLS : 

  • Left click = Shoot
  • Right click / Space bar = Place torch
  • WASD keys / Arrow keys = Move

Programming - Edgar B.

Graphic Assets - Leonard B.

Have fun :D

PS : We're really sorry that there are visual glitches when playing in the browser :(

If you download the game files, it will run smoothly (only for windows)
